testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Ensure Audio Playback works when previewing a slide from Slidehow Question with set Duration ?[90m# question/slideshow/TestAudioPlayback.feature:31?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid information for the question name as "?[0m?[32m?[1mNew Question 3?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.enterQuestionName(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI set the duration to "?[0m?[32m?[1m10?[0m?[32m" seconds?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickAndSetDuration(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click to Preview the Slide?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickPreviewSlideButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am previewing the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.assertSlideshowPreviewPage()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI begin playback of the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.beginPlayback()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI pause playback of the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.pauseSlideshow()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mcurrent playback time is greater than 0?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.assertSlideshowPlayed()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI close the question preview window?[0m ?[90m# QuestionPreviewSteps.closeQuestionPreviewWindow()?[0m
